episodes.title: Part 3. Finale - The Unbelievable House
episodes.description: This limited podcast which is hosted by Andrew Pledger delves into the true story of cult leader Bernard Chaney. Survivors share their stories of the horrific spiritual, physical, psychological, and sexual abuse they experienced and witnessed from Chaney. He has been the pastor of Believers House Worldwide Ministries for a couple of decades. Survivors recount the manipulation, the fear, the guilt, the abuse, and the shame that Chaney used to control members. They are also seeking justice for the children sexually abused at the church's school called Voice of Believers Academy. SIGN PETITION: https://www.change.org/p/expose-bernard-chaney-and-staff-of-abuseJoin Andrew's Patreon HERE and access all bonus episodes + other benefits. https://www.patreon.com/4ndrewpledgerConnect with Andrew Pledger through social media, and his website. https://andrewpledger.mypixieset.com/linksMy Other PodcastsSpeaking Up: Surviving Religions & CultsSurviving BJU: A Christian Cult Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
